snippet: Playing the PGA Tour behind stops in Scotland and Shanghai,  Brooks Koepka gave himself a great chance at yet another detour in his around-the-world journey this year.
abstract: Brooks Koepka, playing in his first regular PGA Tour event, maintains third-round lead at Frys.com Open in San Martin, Calif.
lead_paragraph: Playing the PGA Tour behind stops in Scotland and Shanghai,  Brooks Koepka gave himself a great chance at yet another detour in his around-the-world journey this year.

headline.main: Brooks Koepka, PGA First-Timer, Has the Lead
